scripts.dev: millennium-ttc --build dev && cmd /c taskkill /im steam.exe /f && cmd /c start "" "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steam.exe" -dev
scripts.build: millennium-ttc --build prod && cmd /c taskkill /im steam.exe /f &&  cmd /c start "" "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steam.exe" -dev

name: steam-app-adder
description: A plugin to add steam apps with manifests.
author: Peron4TheWin
